definition: in the Southern United States, a large American feline resembling a lion, also known as a cougar
details:
noun
- in the Southern United States, a large American feline resembling a lion, also known as a cougar
= example: in the Southern United States, a large American feline resembling a lion, also known as a cougar
= synonyms: cougar
- a line that is attached to the bow of a boat and used for tying up (as when docking or towing)
- an artist who paints
= example: an artist who paints
- a worker who is employed to cover objects with paint
= example: a worker who is employed to cover objects with paint
